pageProps.data:
## Histogram Equalization

###### Description

Equalize histogram for given image, result has same dimensions as input image.

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Input image|
|**layers?**|<var>number</var>|Number of layers for a parallel reduction of histogram extraction (2 by default)|

###### Example

```js
gm.equalizeHistogram(tSrc);
```
